data.text: @Tentacledwhisp1 Know Cardiff well. Lived there for a number of years, great city. Can’t beat West Wales though 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿👍😅
@oilpainting71 ah cool, my sister lives in Cardiff, need to explore Wales more.
@Tentacledwhisp1 It’s a lovely cafe takeaway called Pwdin in Aberystwyth. Good coffee and cakes with a great selection produce sourced from across Wales.
@oilpainting71 is that cardiff? reminds me of a shop in the victorian arcade there.
@OldScouserRPing There’s always trouble when Gnomes are around 🤣
@oilpainting71 That's the problem with gnomes, they're all pricks 🤣

@OldScouserRPing Neither of us can hold our drink - Alphonse was cautioned by police, to which he answered “Do you know who I am?”  Tragically they thought he was a Halfling…Apparently I can collect him from the cells tomorrow after he’s cooled down a little. #SaveAlphonse✊
@oilpainting71 Pleased to hear it Joe, hope you and Alphonse are already half pissed
